title: Lucy Dacus Shares Video for New Song “Best Guess”: Watch
description: Inspired by 1990s Calvin Klein ads, the clip features appearances by Cara Delevigne, Towa Bird, and Muna’s Naomi McPherson
author: Walden Green
excerpt: Inspired by 1990s Calvin Klein ads, the clip features appearances by Cara Delevigne, Towa Bird, and Muna’s Naomi McPherson
text: Lucy Dacus has shared a new song. “Best Guess” will appear on her forthcoming album, Forever Is a Feeling, alongside singles “Ankles” (which she played on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon last month) and “Limerence.” The track’s self-directed music video, inspired by Calvin Klein ads of the 1990s, features appearances by Cara Delevigne, Towa Bird, and Muna’s Naomi McPherson. Watch it below.Forever Is a Feeling will be Dacus’ first solo LP since 2021’s Home Video. It’s out March 28 via Geffen. Following the album’s release, Dacus will hit the road for a tour of North America and Europe.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Lucy Dacus: Forever Is a Feeling TourLucy Dacus:02-18 Brooklyn, NY - St. Ann & the Holy Trinity Church02-20 Chicago, IL - The Murphy Auditorium @ Driehaus Museum02-22 San Francisco, CA - Legion of Honor 02-24 Los Angeles, CA - Secret Location TBD04-16 Philadelphia, PA - The Met #04-18 Washington, D.C. - The Anthem #04-21 Boston, MA - MGM Music Hall #04-23 New York, NY - Radio City Music Hall #04-25 Toronto, Ontario - Massey Hall #04-29 Nashville, TN - Ryman Auditorium #05-01 Chicago, IL - Chicago Theatre #05-05 Saint Paul, MN - Palace Theatre #05-07 Kansas City, MO - Midland #05-09 Dallas, TX - Winspear Opera House #05-10 Austin, TX - Moody Amphitheater #05-12 Morrison, CO - Red Rocks Amphitheatre #05-14 Los Angeles, CA - The Greek Theatre #06-12 Oslo, Norway - Rockefellar06-16 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Paradiso06-19 Berlin, Germany - Astra06-24 Brussels, Belgium - Ancienne Belgique06-25 Paris, France - Trianon06-26 London, England - Brixton Academy06-26 Edinburgh, Scotland - Usher Hall07-02 Manchester, England - Academy07-03 Dublin, Ireland - Iveagh Gardens07-05 Roskilde, Denmark - Roskilde Festival# with Katie Gavin and Jasmine.4.T
html:
Lucy Dacus has shared a new song. “Best Guess” will appear on her forthcoming album, Forever Is a Feeling, alongside singles “Ankles” (which she played on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon last month) and “Limerence.” The track’s self-directed music video, inspired by Calvin Klein ads of the 1990s, features appearances by Cara Delevigne, Towa Bird, and Muna’s Naomi McPherson. Watch it below.

Forever Is a Feeling will be Dacus’ first solo LP since 2021’s Home Video. It’s out March 28 via Geffen. Following the album’s release, Dacus will hit the road for a tour of North America and Europe.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
